actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution approving the printing of additional copies of the report accompanying the First Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for fiscal year 1980.

summary.text: Directs the printing, for the use of the House Committee on the Budget, of 1,000 additional copies of the House Report entitled, "First Concurrent Resolution on the Budget - Fiscal Year 1980."

titles.title: A resolution approving the printing of additional copies of the report accompanying the First Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for fiscal year 1980.
